name: Peeper & Reaper
description:
Enter the mysterious tower, 
in search of true power.
But beware!
The almighty gatekeeper,
is that a reaper?
Roaming every floor,
run through the doors,
To the top,
Is where we want to go.

CONTROLS:

-With AWSD and arrow keys I guarantee to be a breeze!

Game developed for the Game Jam "MigJam #3", 2022.
